The
Handyman's App

Handyman Flutter Home Service App helps all on-field handymans to get the receive tasks and get service done.

Buy Now
View Plan
★★★★★ 5/5
#1 Handyman App

Overview

Streamline Handyman's Service Delivery

Here's a quick overview video of Handyman Service Flutter App and its features.

User interface

Stunning & Functional App Design

Functional, well-designed user interface to ensure your Handymen can deliver services faster.

Features

Discover What’s Possible With Handyman App

This Flutter On-Demand Home Service App with complete solution is like a swiss-knife for Handyman. With powerful features helps them deliver service much faster.

Add Extra Charges

An additional charges can be added by the Handyman after the job has been completed

Call/Chat with User

Ability to call and chat with user for better co-ordination and faster service delivery

View Ratings & Reviews

Handyman can view all the ratings and reviews given by the clients

COD - Confirm Payment

For Cash on delivery Services, Handyman can confirm the Client payment directly in the App.

Handyman Online or Offline Mode

Ability to update the status whether Handyman is available to take up the job

Handyman Monthly Revenue

Handyman can see and track his/her monthly revenue visually

Accept or Cancel Booking

Handyman can accept or cancel service booking

Notification

App has inbuilt notification system to alert Handyman if important event.

Get Direction of User

Handyman can start google map direction directly from booking screen

rated 4.7 out of 5

Hear What Customers Say About Handyman

Our customers around the globe have openly shown love for the product and our customer service.
